titles.title: Sales Tax Fairness Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow residents of States with no income tax a deduction for State and local sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Sales Tax Fairness Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the deduction of State and local sales taxes by residents of States which do not impose income taxes.
